content.html: If women or men are the sort of people who think there should be fewer "happily-transitioned" trans people, they aren't welcome at an event that celebrates happily-transitioned trans people. You aren't "women." You're Helen. You aren't welcome because of what YOU believe.
content.value:
If women or men are the sort of people who think there should be fewer "happily-transitioned" trans people, they aren't welcome at an event that celebrates happily-transitioned trans people. 

You aren't "women." You're Helen. You aren't welcome because of what YOU believe.
